translations: [病毒] 逆转录酶病毒（一种致肿瘤病毒）

phrs.translation: 还原病毒载体；逆转录病毒载体

sentences.sentence: Hanger was the first person to genetically sequence the koala retrovirus after its discovery.
sentences.translation: Hanger是第一个对这种考拉逆转录病毒进行基因测序的人。

sentences.sentence: Scientists estimate that 8.3 percent of the human genome can be traced back to retrovirus infections.
sentences.translation: 科学家们估计8.3%的人基因组可以追溯到逆转录病毒的感染。

sentences.sentence: Scientists wanted to know the structure of a protein-cutting enzyme produced by a retrovirus similar to HIV.
sentences.translation: 科学家想要知道一种类似艾滋病毒的逆转录病毒所产生的蛋白质切酶的结构。
